reason: Conflicting signals from growing institutional adoption (Strive, Nomura-backed fund) are currently overshadowed by macroeconomic headwinds (potential inflation resurgence challenging bull narratives) and significant market volatility, evidenced by recent 'split liquidations' punishing both long and short positions. The market lacks clear directional conviction and exhibits high leverage, suggesting a period of caution or distribution.
headlines: Strive proposes $150 million preferred stock sale to repay debt, buy bitcoin
Nomura-backed Laser Digital introduces tokenized bitcoin yield-bearing fund
New research projects U.S. inflation resurgence, challenging bitcoin bulls' disinflation bets
Crypto market steadies as Japan's bond market chaos eases
Bitcoin swings trigger rare split liquidation as longs and shorts both get hit
